website_summaries.verdict: The ultimate multi-tool for outdoor enthusiasts who are interested in a compact survival kit.
pros: Contains 12 survival tools inside a wallet card
Includes a compass, knife and knife sharpener, magnifying glass, and tweezers
Comes with free paracord and emergency whistle (not attached)
cons: This card is the thickness of 4 credit cards, so it may not fit easily into a credit card pocket

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little Tools At a bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool product for a number of reasons. One, the card is small but pretty well made for the price. The little tools could really come in hand for those little issues that require a tool, but you don't carry around a tool belt everywhere you go. If hard presses in an emergency the fire starter will come in handy, and if that doesn't work there is a magnifying glass. It even has a small push knife for those who want to carve out a fire making set out of wood. Really cool, would make a great stocking stuffer gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rg's

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT fit in credit card sized sleeve.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this item two stars because I believe certain important qualities of the product are left ambiguous in product discription. This item will not come close to fitting inside a credit card sized sleeve. It’s larger than a credit card. If your sleeve is essentially the same size as a standard credit card or just barely bigger, this item will not fit. In my case I was hoping it would fit in credit card sleeve I have attached to back of phone. No chance. With respect to build quality, etc, I’d say typical. Not bad but not exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Carlos

customer_reviews.title: more like an emery board
customer_reviews.text: It's just... okay. The knife seems decent, the whistle is functional, and the tweezers and the toothpick will doubtless come in handy, but the sharpener grit is already partially scraped off (definitely not solid stone, more like an emery board?) and the fire starter won't spark. Like, on anything. Three stars because at least it comes with everything it says and it's mostly functional, but the most survivor-centric items are not. It's still going in the kids' stockings because at least in that case, having a non-functional fire starter is actually kind of a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: He is very pleased. The only draw back is the thickness - ...
customer_reviews.text: We did a White Elephant/Chinese Christmas and this was part of my gift to give away. The fiance' of one of the group got this. He said that he'd asked her for one for Christmas but didn't get it. We tried to make sure no one stole the gift as is the process. He did get to take it home. He is very pleased. The only draw back is the thickness - - we didn't research quite enough in that regard - - but it is great to keep in a back pack/glove box/whatever for an emergency situation.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J James

customer_reviews.title: It's "meh"
customer_reviews.text: The product feels flimsy. The knife came sharp and works effectively. The toothpick is a toothpick, not much to say. Firestarter works well with the knife. The opener works fine. The magnifying glass came without scratches and works well enough. The whistle works well enough for its size. The paracord is as advertised. However, the tweezers are terrible and you'd be better off using your fingernails. Also, the compass doesn't work. At all. Even away from all metal, the compass does not work. Overall, the good things are pretty much just the knife, firestarter, and opener.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DiPuma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even the cheap price!
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes as a stocking stuffer for Christmas but very disappointed! Compass is not accurate! Magnifying glass is not clear at all. The can opener is sharp enough to pierce a can and the fire Stryker only barely sparked after almost 50 tries? It’s not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: KJ 31

customer_reviews.title: I love this new card
customer_reviews.text: I've carried one of these kinds of credit card tools in my wallet for years, and use it several times a week. The knife is my box cutter that coworkers can't appropriate, and I've actually used the can opener and compass once or twice! The new Tactical Credit Card Wallet Tool I just purchased includes a WORKING fire starter and an emergency whistle. I love this new card, and plan to pick a few more up for gifts to friends during the year. If you don't have one, get one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mighty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit in a wallet
customer_reviews.text: Super nifty tool and my husband enjoyed it, it just doesn’t fit in a wallet like it says. Or at least isn’t thin enough for it to not be incredibly bulky. But my husband keeps it in his glove box and knows it’ll come in handy at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really fit the wallet so I haven't been carrying ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really fit the wallet so I haven't been carrying the tool too much. However, it's definitely handy. The knife, bottle opener, and paracord are what I mostly use. The magnifying glass and compass doesn't seem to be reliable. The tool also seems to catch the attention of my friends whenever I whip it out from my bag and show its usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Must have pocket item.
customer_reviews.text: This is one outstanding wallet kit. My only reservations are that the magnifier and whistle are a bit small and difficult to use. Otherwise, the rest of the kit is outstanding. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its okay.
customer_reviews.text: the compass does not work ,the cord is cheap, the grinding stone is about 3cm deep in the plastic so it cannot be used,the other aspects give t two stars, should be 4.99
customer_reviews.author: ramiro

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. In this case, it's an incomplete product! Arrived without the advertised whistle. The compass is stuck in one position.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pigford

customer_reviews.title: Tactical Credit Tool fits in your wallet but its thick
customer_reviews.text: Got the Tactical Credit Card Wallet for a friend. They loved it say it was what they wanted. It fits in their wallet it is thick about the size of 4 credit cards. I would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He loves it. I thought you could put actual credit cards in it. You cannot. It's a pretty cool little thing and all the tools are pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Tactical Credit Card Wallet Tool with Emergency Whistle
customer_reviews.text: Tactical Credit Card Wallet Tool with Emergency Whistle is a good idea to have around in case of emergency and something that a woman could keep in her purse....
customer_reviews.author: John Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: It's different. But handy. I'm taking it to use at work. It's small enough to fit in my pocket, but the whistle is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Vaught

customer_reviews.title: *** Caution***Broken merchandise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a gift. I was disappointed to find out that the item was broken, after the gift recipient opened it. It would be nice if the seller would check their products for quality, before selling them. It's a neat item, but it's broken garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Kile Jackson

customer_reviews.title: The Full Package
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, and all the components seem to work as advertised. It came in a very nice little box, and the whistle was a very nice touch. My one complaint is that the toothpick is impossible to move on mine, but I don't have much of a problem with this.
customer_reviews.author: MooImAFox

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I just received the tool and haven't had the occasion to use it yet, but it appears to be everything advertised. Sturdy, very compact, everything in good working order. I'm looking forward to trying it out - but I hope I don't need the "survival" nature of it! :-)
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent credit card tool for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this tool is EXACTLY as it is billed. The knife is VERY sharp, the flint works, and the design is ingenious. The magnifier is not meant for magnification, though. It's meant for focusing light to help start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Bigner

customer_reviews.title: Compass problems.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first unit because the compass did not work at all and compass on the second world marginally. I took the unit outside, removed all of the metal items and it improved the performance slightly. Otherwise, everything else works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Podtrek.

customer_reviews.title: It provides me will tools like a knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a real neat and handy tool to have on hand. It provides me will tools like a knife, a magnifying glass, and a flint for starting fires. Not saying I will be in a situation that would require me to build a fire but it's good to know I could. I recommend this tool for anyone not just the out doors person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd have given 5 stars except for the whistle and paracord. While they do as expected, the only way to connect to the wallet tool is at the top left corner but then it won't fit well in a wallet.
customer_reviews.author: TotalBalance

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as stocking stuffers for all the men in my life! Great little product, awesome to keep handy. Everyone seemed to enjoy the simplicity and usefulness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Little Rotelle

customer_reviews.title: or in a pack it works great. Have had it for less than 24 hours ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit big for a front pocket and i wont put it in a back pocket but in a cargo pocket for constant carry, the glove box, or in a pack it works great. Have had it for less than 24 hours and still playing with it but have already decided to buy one for each vehicle and one for each of the families b.o.b..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big for a wallet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is think, and is definitely going to take up space in a wallet. I keep it in a backpack i use for work and for travel in general.
customer_reviews.author: TheMr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My father in law loved this gift. It's really neat.
customer_reviews.author: Triston D.

customer_reviews.title: ... it when held it needed more handle not a good grip if you need to slice someone
customer_reviews.text: The knife has a wierd feel to it when held it needed more handle not a good grip if you need to slice someone....fire starter didn't work that good
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbage do not waste your money on this Chinesse cheaply made thing.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad to have on oneself, especially if your lost.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to have on oneself, especially if your lost. I thought this was Going to be a flimsy piece of crap, when actually it's pretty sturdy. Also, the price was good considering what's inside.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All tools are good, only thing would be great is if tweezer was made of metal 😎

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Lovely. Fits comfortably in my hand. The only downside is that the clip on the whistle is thin and wears down quickly on a key ring. Other than that perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Paired with my hydration pack
customer_reviews.text: Cool survival gadget to fit in a bike hydration pack. Sits flat and barely takes up any room at all. It’s about 6 credit cards thick.
customer_reviews.author: A Guy Named Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Versatile tool.
customer_reviews.text: Item ordered came as shown packed according to size and in an expeditious manner. Look forward to passing out as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy guzman

customer_reviews.title: easy acess for cutting packages
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a handy toolset near front door, easy acess for cutting packages. In emergency works as a punch knife too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Knife sharpener is useless, compass kinda works, fire starter barely sparks. Knife seems alright I guess
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for survivalists
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for survivalists and zombie apocalypse friends; thing has all the basics you need right in the wallet next to your Visa.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lightweight Emergency Kit for all!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect emergence kit for hikers,bikers, & to have in emergency kit at home. Plan on buying some for Christmas gifts!

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for someone that hates wallets. Forces to you to stop carrying so much crap. Only what you need

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my 20 year old son and he loved it. He was amazed at all it could do!

customer_reviews.title: A very versatile tool. Haven't had the need to ...
customer_reviews.text: A very versatile tool. Haven't had the need to use it yet, in a survival situation. Hope i never do but, Be Prepared I will!

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious little tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my nephew., along with a book and bookmark, for making his Eagle Scout award. He got a real kick out of it.

customer_reviews.title: Tactile credit card wallet tool
customer_reviews.text: We got this as gifts. We like it so much we're ordering more for ourself, and as gifts. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Best in Breed!

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my grandson for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson for Christmas so I can't review honestly yet. I will once I hear from my grandson what he thinks. I purchased this for him because he is a hunter and loves the wilderness.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Item didn't really fit in wallet but other than that its a great product it fit in the end i had to force it and ended up tearing the wallet.

customer_reviews.title: ... this was a neat gift to give as an easy but interesting Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to shop for men but this was a neat gift to give as an easy but interesting Christmas gift

customer_reviews.title: Good addition.
customer_reviews.text: A bit flimsy but not expensive and is a good addition to my camping gear.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. You guys get better and better
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. You guys get better and better. For us Baby-Boomers, survival in the sate of our world today weights heavily on our minds for safety not only for ourselves, but of our children and grandchildren. Nice work. Peace. Mike Hays (renegadehays.com)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice, indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I still need to try it on survival situations, but sure as hell looks good it'd have been better if the whistle was also inside the main body or if the magnesium rod was either slightly thicker or not painted, but that aside, I'm, as of now, satisfied I'll update my review when I have put it through some tougher testing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality

customer_reviews.title: Not my style.
customer_reviews.text: It's great but in my opinion it's not designed to be placed in a wallet. It's about 1/4 the thickness of a standard wallet itself.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tactical credit card
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tactical credit card. Quality material and durable: the tweezers could be a little Better if we're being honest but 4/5 stars for this guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Valentine's gift for my boyfriend and he loved it.

customer_reviews.text: Received this right on time, great service, and exactly as described! Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool to keep on your person
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool to keep on your person. The knife is easy to extract and use. Definitely not for self defense, but otherwise a great tool to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I loved it but
customer_reviews.text: Near perfection. I loved it but, the compass works only when completely level and it's too wide to fit in my carbon fiber card holder / bill fold.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: It is as pictured and fits perfectly in my small wallet.
customer_reviews.author: SRJ

customer_reviews.title: I didn't bother trying the other stuff as I was already disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact. But the tweezer's lips are not aligned and compass doesn't work. I didn't bother trying the other stuff as I was already disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ang Supremo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. A little bit thick to be considered "credit card" sized, but very nice besides that.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present. Hope the one who will get it, will like it. Quality looks very good!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's designed to do. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Quite handy, the knife sharpener is a bit flush, so by the time it's sharp, you've probably already dulled the blade by cutting up the casing. Otherwise fun and reliable, the flint strikes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design bad material on somethings
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know: About same size as credit card but thicker. About 4 maybe 5 credit cards put together.. GOOD: Sharp knife holding its edge well. Everything stays clipped in good. Compass actually works. Fits nice in back pocket but not in my wallet. BAD:Toothpick and tweezers, they are plastic and suck if they would replaced them with metal ones i would rate 4 stars. And if compass was bigger or they added a little light or something would give 5 stars. I don't know if i would buy again without it having at least better tweezers they are a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many products I tested on a hiking trip. The knife is useful. Can opener too if your familiar with the design. I couldn't get the flint to spark, but I'm awful at that so it too may be fine. Tweezers - utter plastic garbage Compass - useless no rotation at all Magnifier - too small to even use
customer_reviews.author: Inez Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This is so handy
customer_reviews.text: The tool is so cool. My friends love the features and find it super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Lecc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This tool was the biggest disappointment. First, it is not the size of a credit card. It's MUCH larger and heavier. Most of the tools were useless. In fact, since I couldn't think of one person who could use this tool, I threw it in the trash. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Fran B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and he loved it. They also have amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: kelsey jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget, but a mite difficult to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy little gadget, but a mite difficult to get used to.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed. The compass reads wrong, and is not consistent. The magnifying glass projects things backwards, and does not work unless you hold it *right * next to something. Good idea, but it needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Neat and very handy tool!
customer_reviews.text: This tool looks really cool. I bought it for my husband as part of his birthday gift, which is coming up. So, I haven't opened it. But, I'm sure he's going to love it. The item arrived just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shelli S.

customer_reviews.title: Sure why not this one?
customer_reviews.text: Sure if this is exactly what you want . If not, keep looking, these few manufacturers probably have thought of anything you could possibly want just look until you find it. No sense in not getting exactly what you want, trust me it's already out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chasrox

customer_reviews.title: Nice Concept
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but really too thick for a man's thin wallet.
customer_reviews.author: SlawsieV

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the coolest things I have gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest things I have gotten in a long time. Should have ordered more and given them as gifts. Must have item.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great tool and you’d be surprised how often you find yourself using it! Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and useful you may need it in those hard times and it won’t let you down.

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, cool little tool. They definitely loved it.

product_meta.title: Tactical Credit Card Wallet Tool with Emergency Whistle and Gift Box
feature_bullets: CONCEALED TOOL CARD - 12 survival tools in 1 slim wallet card.
FITS IN YOUR WALLET - This handy multitool card will fit into any standard credit card slot. It has the thickness of 4 credit cards.
SHARP CARD KNIFE - The knife is a durable partial serrated blade with a fish line cutter tip and hex tool.
GREAT GIFT - The perfect survival gift for that special someone who wants to kick down the door and save the day.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - At Survival Hax we respond to all issues within 6 hours and will work hard to make you happy.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars219 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
